name: Neon D-Fence Remaster
description:
An AI menace is headed to your motherboard! CAN YOU SURVIVE?!

Tower defense meets endless runner in the newest action packed indie mobile game!

* Play on ten different maps
* Plan your strategy
* Place your towers
* Unlock a variety of upgrades to aid in your Survival!

How long can you survive for the ultimate high score?

Earn "Ram" and "Data," the in-game currency, to place and upgrade your towers. With 10 unique tower types to unlock using Data, you'll be able to build an arsenal of devastating weaponry that's sure to give you the upper hand.

Face off against enemies like regular grunts, explosive enemies, and bosses that are tougher and more powerful than anything else you've seen before.

Place your towers strategically to create deadly mazes for enemies to navigate. Each tower has its own health, so be on guard for enemies who will stop at nothing to destroy them!

Fight to survive for as long as you can, earning the ultimate high score and bragging rights among your friends and fellow gamers.

This Godot engine game has a fascinating history, starting as a beginner demo made for fun by a talented young developer. With the help of close friends and TnT Gamez LLC video game studio, it has evolved into a heart-pumping indie mobile game that goes way beyond your wildest expectations.

So, are you ready to take on the AI menace and claim the ultimate high score?
